name: test_delivering_vaccination_after_psd
description:
Test: A PSD can be created for a child and the vaccination can be
   administered by a healthcare assistant.
Steps:
1. Import child records and set up a session with PSD enabled.
2. Record verbal consent with PSD option for the child.
3. Verify the PSD is created.
4. Log in as a healthcare assistant and administer the vaccination.
Verification:
- The PSD is correctly created and the vaccination is recorded without errors.
descriptionHtml:
Test: A PSD can be created for a child and the vaccination can be
administered by a healthcare assistant.
Steps:

  1. Import child records and set up a session with PSD enabled.
  2. Record verbal consent with PSD option for the child.
  3. Verify the PSD is created.
  4. Log in as a healthcare assistant and administer the vaccination.
    Verification:
  • The PSD is correctly created and the vaccination is recorded without errors.

…
- unexpected value " LEWIS, Frederick Date of birth21 October 2018 (aged 6)Year groupYear 2, 8T5PSD statusPSD not added "
statusTrace:
setup_session_with_one_child = 'ABC123' sessions_page = schools = {'HPV': [School(name='Bromley Trust Alternative Provision Academy', urn='141116', site=None), School(name='Uppingham C...tle Reddings Primary School', urn='137861', site=None), School(name='Gotham Primary School', urn='122644', site=None)]} verbal_consent_page = children = {'HPV': [Child(first_name='Francis', last_name='MANN', nhs_number='9474208255', address=('Studio 29', 'Ward river', 'W...ample.net'), Parent(full_name='Geraldine Burrows-Mills', relationship='Mum', email_address='gregory68@example.org')))]} log_in_page = healthcare_assistant = User(username='pamelagraham@example.com', password='pamelagraham@example.com', role='healthcare_assistant') team = Team(name='Clarke-Cunningham est. 1788', workgroup='O425O', careplus_venue_code='O425O', email='sharon57@example.org', phone='(07700) 900 236') dashboard_page = def test_delivering_vaccination_after_psd( setup_session_with_one_child, sessions_page, schools, verbal_consent_page, children, log_in_page, healthcare_assistant, team, dashboard_page, ): """ Test: A PSD can be created for a child and the vaccination can be administered by a healthcare assistant. Steps: 1. Import child records and set up a session with PSD enabled. 2. Record verbal consent with PSD option for the child. 3. Verify the PSD is created. 4. Log in as a healthcare assistant and administer the vaccination. Verification: - The PSD is correctly created and the vaccination is recorded without errors. """ child = children[Programme.FLU][0] school = schools[Programme.FLU][0] fluenz_batch_name = setup_session_with_one_child sessions_page.click_session_for_programme_group(school, Programme.FLU) sessions_page.click_edit_session() sessions_page.click_change_psd() sessions_page.answer_whether_psd_should_be_enabled("Yes") sessions_page.click_continue_button() sessions_page.click_continue_link() sessions_page.click_consent_tab() sessions_page.search_child(child) sessions_page.click_programme_tab(Programme.FLU) sessions_page.click_record_a_new_consent_response() verbal_consent_page.parent_verbal_positive( parent=child.parents[0], change_phone=False, programme=Programme.FLU, consent_option=ConsentOption.BOTH, psd_option=True, ) sessions_page.click_psds_tab() sessions_page.search_for(str(child)) > sessions_page.check_child_has_psd(child) tests/test_psd.py:116: _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ self = child = Child(first_name='Frederick', last_name='LEWIS', nhs_number='9902622852', address=('Studio 31M', 'Clare locks', 'West ...s='kwright@example.org'), Parent(full_name='Amelia Burke', relationship='Mum', email_address='heather09@example.org'))) def check_child_has_psd(self, child: Child) -> None: patient_card = self.page.locator( f'div.nhsuk-card.app-card.app-card--compact:has(h4:has-text("{child!s}"))' ) > expect(patient_card).to_contain_text("PSD added") E AssertionError: Locator expected to contain text 'PSD added' E Actual value: E E LEWIS, Frederick E E E E E E E Date of birth21 October 2018 (aged 6)Year groupYear 2, 8T5PSD statusPSD not added E E E E E Call log: E - Expect "to_contain_text" with timeout 5000ms E - waiting for locator("div.nhsuk-card.app-card.app-card--compact:has(h4:has-text(\"LEWIS, Frederick\"))") E 9 × locator resolved to
…
E - unexpected value " E E LEWIS, Frederick E E E E E E E Date of birth21 October 2018 (aged 6)Year groupYear 2, 8T5PSD statusPSD not added E E E E " mavis/test/pages/sessions.py:875: AssertionError

testStage.description:
Test: A PSD can be created for a child and the vaccination can be
   administered by a healthcare assistant.
Steps:
1. Import child records and set up a session with PSD enabled.
2. Record verbal consent with PSD option for the child.
3. Verify the PSD is created.
4. Log in as a healthcare assistant and administer the vaccination.
Verification:
- The PSD is correctly created and the vaccination is recorded without errors.

Click on Change patient specific direction

Answer whether PSD should be enabled with 'Yes'

Click on 'Mr Guy Cole (Dad)' radio button

Select 'No' for health question 'Does your child take oral steroids for their asthma?'

parameters.name: args
parameters.value: (<HealthQuestion.ASTHMA_STEROIDS: 'Does your child take oral steroids for their asthma?'>, 'No')

steps.name: Select 'No' for health question 'Has your child ever been admitted to intensive care because of their asthma?'

parameters.name: args
parameters.value: (<HealthQuestion.ASTHMA_INTENSIVE_CARE: 'Has your child ever been admitted to intensive care because of their asthma?'>, 'No')
